posts.message:
To Android Developers,
I am building a project-lib with Maven that should export an aar so I can add it later to any of my projects at the dependencies, but at the final step when I try to run ./gradlew uploadArchives, it gives me this error which is seem to be an error finding the gradle version.

Any idea how to solve this issue?

ÙˆØ´ÙƒØ±Ø§ Ù…Ù‚Ø¯Ù…Ø§ .

SA,
I'm having a huge problem in my coding life. I'm too attached to Java.
I DO code other languages (python,ruby,C,C++), but when it comes to my choice, I always choose Java.
Even when I started learning Server Side, I started with ROR. It's so powerful, but still I wasn't so enthusiastic about it, but once I tried JavaEE I just fell in love with it from the first line of code, thinking of the cool projects I can implement in Java.
The question is: Is what I'm feeling normal? Is it healthy? If not, why am I feeling this? And how can I overcome this?
Thanks in advance.
Is it Applicable to change the front-end of Magento with Angular.JS? and what are the solution to overcome for concurrent customers  for the E-Commerce platform with Magento?
